snippet: Businesses that accept credit cards usually have to give up a percentage of each transaction to the banks. But Scvngr, a start-up that offers a mobile payments app called LevelUp, says it has found a way to bring that number to zero.
abstract: Businesses that accept credit cards usually have to give up a percentage of each transaction to the banks. But Scvngr, a start-up that offers a mobile payments app called LevelUp, says it has found a way to bring that number to zero.

headline.main: LevelUp Tries Dropping the Transaction Fee for Mobile Payments
